title: Roberto Carlos is the Celebrity Behind New Credicard Campaign
summary: Sao Paulo, Brazil - Credicard, a subsidiary of Citi in Brazil, launched the first ad featuring renowned celebrity Roberto Carlos for a new campaign for the Credicard Emoções ("Emotions") card. The commercial is part of a brand strategy that includes the sponsorship of the mega-show, "Emoções in Jerusalem." Roberto Carlos is partnering with Credicard, who named the card after one of his greatest hits - the song "Emoções." The singer's deep involvement in the project led him to act as co-author of the commercial, created by Publicis.
tag-1: Roberto Carlos is the Celebrity Behind New Credicard Campaign
tag-2: Sao Paulo, Brazil – Credicard, a subsidiary of Citi in Brazil, launched the first ad featuring renowned celebrity Roberto Carlos for a new campaign for the Credicard Emoções ("Emotions") card. The commercial is part of a brand strategy that includes the sponsorship of the mega-show, "Emoções in Jerusalem." Roberto Carlos is partnering with Credicard, who named the card after one of his greatest hits – the song "Emoções." The singer's deep involvement in the project led him to act as co-author of the commercial, created by Publicis.
tag-3: "Roberto Carlos is among the most important idols – possibly the greatest – in Brazil, with a legion of fans across all ages and social classes that are true followers of his choices. Having a product tied to Robert is not only a big deal, it is an honor and a privilege for the Credicard brand," says Cintia Yamamoto, Credicard Vice President of Marketing. "He thoroughly represents Credicard's values — a Brazilian democratic brand strongly linked to entertainment and music."
tag-4: Produced by Conspiração and directed by Breno Silveira, the commercial shows consumers enjoying moments of success enabled by the card, which stems from a partnership between Credicard, DC7 from Doddy Sirena and Roberto Carlos. The ad also highlights the card's benefits: Emoções em Alto Mar ("Emotions on the High Seas") Cruises, visits to artists' dressing rooms and ticket pre-sales.
tag-5: As the official sponsor of the "Emoções in Jerusalem" show, to be aired September 10 in Rede Globo, the Credicard brand will be shared throughout several media initiatives. The sponsorship and commercial are aligned with this year's Credicard campaign, which also includes merchandising, print and digital media initiatives.
tag-6: "Roberto Carlos is more than an idol of our music, he is an ambassador for the entire country — a country that allures, which is everything that Credicard wants to inspire in its customers: attract them forever," said Hugo Rodriguez, Publicis COO and CCO.
